text: "Ride My See-Saw" is a 1968 song by English progressive rock band The Moody Blues and is the second single from their third studio album In Search of the Lost Chord. It went to number 42 in the United Kingdom, number 61 in the United States and number 33 in Canada. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:The Moody Blues songs Category:Progressive rock songs
title: Ride My See-Saw
